sentences.en: A bumble - bee stung one then there were five.
sentences.cn: 飞来一蜇命呜呼,六个只剩五.

sentences.en: And live with me, sweet bumble bee?
sentences.cn: 和我一起白头到老, 亲爱的大黄蜂?

sentences.en: Don't bumble through life like that.

sentences.cn: 对他不能手软, 班布尔.

sentences.en: European orchid whose flowers resemble bumble bees in shape and color.
sentences.cn: 欧洲的一种兰,花的形状和颜色像蜜蜂.

sentences.en: He seems to bumble along through life happily enough.
sentences.cn: 他似乎很愉快地混日子.

sentences.en: I thought to myself,'This is really going to bumble me '.
sentences.cn: 我心里想: ‘ 这简直是要我难堪 ’. ”

sentences.en: Little daisy purple flowers waved at Shandie the bumble bee.
sentences.cn: 小紫花们也很欢迎小蜜蜂仙蒂的到来.

sentences.en: Mr Bumble tapped with his cane on the counter several times.
sentences.cn: 班布尔先生用他的藤杖轻轻敲了几下柜台.

sentences.en: Mr. Bumble coughed again, and slightly smiled.
sentences.cn: 班布尔先生又咳嗽一声, 微微一笑.

sentences.en: Mr. Bumble tasted the medicine with a doubtful look.
sentences.cn: 班布尔先生带着疑惑的表情尝了尝这种药.

sentences.en: Mr. Bumble was fairly taken by surprise , and fairly beaten.
sentences.cn: 班布尔先生吃的这一惊非同小可,挨的这顿打也真够瞧的.

sentences.en: Mr. Bumble's conduct , on being left to himself, was rather inexplicable.
sentences.cn: 班布尔先生独自留下时的举动实在令人费解.

sentences.en: Notice the bumble bee, the small child, and the smiling faces.
sentences.cn: 留意振翅的黄蜂 、 无忧无虑的孩子, 和欢乐的笑脸.

sentences.en: Shandie the bumble bee buzzed around the flowers in the forest.
sentences.cn: 蜜蜂仙蒂,嗡嗡嗡的在森林里的一处花丛里飞舞著.

sentences.en: What was Karl bumbling on about?
sentences.cn: 卡尔嘀嘀咕咕地在说什么呀？

words.tran_cn: 装模作样的；笨手笨脚的；爱管闲事的
犯错误；踉跄；结结巴巴地说话

phrases.tran_cn: 大黄蜂，熊蜂；桁洩网渔船

trans.tran_en: to speak in a confused way, so that no one can understand you

trans.tran_cn: 犯错误，杂乱无章地说，发出嗡嗡声，笨拙地进行
笨手笨脚地做，搞坏，弄糟，笨手笨脚地走动
